name: Ben Thanh Retreats Hotel
address: 121/39 Le Thi Rieng street, Ben Thanh ward, District 1, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở TP. Hồ Chí Minh và cách Chợ Bến Thành 13 phút đi bộ, Ben Thanh Retreats Hotel cung cấp dịch vụ tiền sảnh, các phòng không gây dị ứng, phòng chờ chung, Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ và sân hiên. Chỗ nghỉ này nằm gần các điểm tham quan như Dinh Thống Nhất, Trung tâm mua sắm Takashimaya Việt Nam, cùng Ủy ban nhân dân Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Chỗ nghỉ này cách Công viên Tao Đàn chưa đến 1 km và trung tâm thành phố 700 m.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại Ben Thanh Retreats Hotel, phòng nào cũng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Bảo tàng Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Bảo tàng Mỹ thuật và Bảo tàng chứng tích chiến tranh. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Tân Sơn Nhất, cách Ben Thanh Retreats Hotel 7 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ này cũng cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.rating: This accomodation deserves all its high ratings, but the exceptional welcoming and assistance =10
review.comment_positive:
The manager and his wife and staff were exceptional in their hospitality. Nothing was any trouble and always looking to assist. Beautiful breakfast, welcoming drinks every day and night, laundry service.
We made very good friendships with other guests and most of all with the team at the hotel.
review.comment_negative: Nothing. Everything was as good as it gets

review.rating: I really enjoyed that hotel and the staff was so loverly. I felt at home.
review.comment_positive: perfect location, very ni^ce and light room, staff lovely.

The room was spacious and also the toilet.
The breakfast very complete, the staff super attentive. The welcome drink, the best one!!
review.comment_negative: Nothing really, all good here, maybe the access is a bit in a sinous street but i felt safe even at night

review.comment_positive: Value for money
review.comment_negative: Balcony view was a bit of a stretch.

review.rating: It was a fabulous stay. The staff were so welcoming . And so helpful. It was very much appreciated
review.comment_positive: The staff were so helpful with where we should visit and how to book a bus to our next destination. Very friendly. Nothing was too much trouble. Breakfast was plentiful. Our room was made up everyday. Fabulous location in a really quaint alleyway. I would definitely stay there again.
review.comment_negative: Everything was perfect.

review.comment_positive: Front desk guy was great!

review.rating: Loved every thing about the property!
review.comment_positive: The location. & the staff were great! The two young men managing the desk were very helpful. Really a plus!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Our second time staying here and again perfect. Very spacious room, good Air con and comfy bed all in a perfect location. Would recommend staying here.

The location was perfect. Very close to all the main attractions, in the centre of District 1, but in a very quiet street so great for good nights sleep. The staff were very welcoming and so helpful. Would recommend staying here.
All was good, except airconditioner didn't work perfect
review.comment_negative: Airconditioning was not really good.

review.rating: This accomodation deserves all its high ratings, but the exceptional welcoming and assistance =10
review.comment_positive:
The manager and his wife and staff were exceptional in their hospitality. Nothing was any trouble and always looking to assist. Beautiful breakfast, welcoming drinks every day and night, laundry service.
We made very good friendships with other guests and most of all with the team at the hotel.
